textTranslations.activity-detail-2: When a friend starts an activity - like playing a game or hanging out on voice - we'll show it here!
textTranslations.log-out-prompt: Are you sure you want to log out?
textTranslations.leave-guild-detail: Are you sure you want to leave guild?
textTranslations.channel-type-description: Send messages, images, GIFs, emojis, ideas, and jokes
textTranslations.channel-type-voice-description: Talk or video chat together, or share your screen
textTranslations.join-a-guild-detail: Enter an invitation below to join an existing guild.
textTranslations.customize-guild-detail: Give your new server a personality with a name and an icon. You can always change it later.
textTranslations.guild-join-invite-title: INVITE CODE - Please enter a valid invite link or invite code
textTranslations.create-your-guild-detail: Your guild is the place where you hang out with your friends. Create your own guild and start chatting.
textTranslations.invites-guild-detail: Or send a guild invite link to your friend
textTranslations.fail-message-text: The message could not be delivered. This might be because you do not share any guilds with the recipient or the recipient only accepts direct messages from friends.
textTranslations.start-of-guild: This, is the start of guild.
textTranslations.addfrienddetailtext: You can add your friends with their LiventCord name.
textTranslations.friendAddYourselfErrorText: You cant be friends with yourself!
textTranslations.upload-error-message: You can only upload image files! (JPG, PNG or GIF)!
textTranslations.join-error-response: INVITE LINK - Invite is invalid or expired
textTranslations.private-channel-description: Only selected members and roles will be able to view this channel
textTranslations.delete-message-prompt: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

errorTranslations.EMAIL_EXISTS_WITH_PASSWORD: This email is already associated with a password. To log in with Google, please link your Google account in your account settings.
errorTranslations.UNKNOWN_LOGIN_ERROR: Login failed due to an unknown error.
errorTranslations.NETWORK_ERROR_LOGIN: Login failed due to network or server error
errorTranslations.PASSWORD_REQUIRED: Password is required to link your Google account.
errorTranslations.INVALID_PASSWORD: Incorrect password. Google account not linked.
errorTranslations.EMAIL_MISMATCH: The Google account email does not match your registered email.
errorTranslations.INVALID_GOOGLE_TOKEN: Google authentication failed. Please try again.
errorTranslations.GOOGLE_LINK_FAILED: Failed to link Google account due to server error.
errorTranslations.UNKNOWN_LINK_ERROR: Failed to link Google account due to an unknown error.
